info.name: Beverage Bully
info.attribution:
Game layout and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

All ingredient icons are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji

Library image and background from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/pattern-with-beer-bottles-different-colors_927859.htm
info.description: Serve your own delicious beverages, and bully others by contaminating their ingredients.

label-guide.text:
DECK COMPOSITION:
* 2p:	1 1 1 1 2 2 2 3 3 in four suits
* 3p-4p:	1 1 1 1 2 2 2 3 3 in five suits

TURN STRUCTURE:
* Play a card from hand face down
-OR-
* Flip a card on board face up

ENDGAME TRIGGERS:
* A player starts turn with 3 cards in hand
-OR-
* All players flip cards consecutively
-OR-
* All cards on board are face up

clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number
